extendedInfo.description: Please install the new ver. before writing a review!âCardBank in the News!âNYTimes - http://nyti.ms/aYlmIrLadies Home Journal - http://bit.ly/dw30I6Daily Press - http://bit.ly/chI3SkâCheck out Ver 2.0 features below!âDo you shop? Do you use loyalty cards when you go to the gym/grocery store/mall/convenience store/etc.?If you answered yes to either of these questions then you have to get CardBank!CardBank conveniently stores all of your loyalty / preferred shopper cards right on your iPhone/iPod Touch!âDoes it work?ââ YES! CardBank will work at every retailer with a hand scanner as evidenced by our reviewers below.â Those reviews who say CardBank doesn't work, state in their own words that they only tried it ONCE and when it didn't work on the first scan, immediately wrote off the entire app as a scam. This simply isn't true and we have asked repeatedly for people to contact us through Twitter so we can help with any problems which 9 out of 10 times is user error. (Interestingly enough, those who leave bad reviews would rather complain than take advantage of our customer service.) âFeaturesââ All of your preferred/membership cards stored on your iPhoneâ Ability to add custom cardsâ Map feature to locate nearest retailerâ Easy to add/update cards with number checking featureâ 100% Private, app does NOT track usage statistics or collect your membership numberâ Works in portrait and landscape views (bigger bar code in landscape for easier scanning)â Created and supported (through Twitter and Email) by a leading bar code solution provider in the nation.âTestimonialsââ âFound this to be a very helpful application and was excited when it worked at my grocery store. This will be a keeper.â âReview from iPhoneAppListâ âThe iTunes reviews for this app were all over the place. Some loved it, some hated it. Iâm wondering how many of the people who couldnât get it to work werenât following the scanning tips.â -iPhoneMomâTipsââ Set your device to full brightnessâ Rotate your device to landscape viewâ Use handheld scanners if possibleâ Scan at a slight angle â Hold the scanner 6â away from your iPhoneâStill have questions?ââ Visit our website at http://barcode2mobile.comâ Reply to us on Twitter, our user name is âCardBankâCardBank is created and supported by one of the leading barcode solution providers in the nation. If a card does not currently appear on our retailer list, notify us through the link on the Info screen in the app or on Twitter and we will add it in a future update! (Remember to take and send us a picture of the barcode on your card so we can add it!)CardBank has been in the top 50 Utilities consistently â download now to see why!For more information and support, please view our website at http://barcode2mobile.comâAdditional NotesâWe cannot respond to card requests or reviews unless you submit them through Twitter or email. If you would like to talk to us directly please use one of those methods of communication.Thank you,CardBank Development TeamWhat's new-Expanded Retailer List!-Tons of New Graphics!-Custom Cards Are Back!-Fixed the Map Function!To all of our users:We sincerely apologize for the delay in the release of this upgrade and appreciate all of you who have stuck with us. We have expanded our development team so that future updates can be expedited as we continue to improve and expand CardBank. -CardBank Dev Team

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t always scan at register
reviews.comment: I\'m on a Motorola Atrix. I don\'t use a screen protector and it\'s 50/50 when trying to use it. It\'s a great idea but sometimes it\'s just too weird handing my phone over to the person at the cash register and having to explain what it is. Here, take my phone and scan it. LOL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Piece of Junk
reviews.comment: Would have given it zero stars if it was posible to do so. The app crashed immediatley after installation. The same occured even after rebooting my HTC Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So far 0-2 trying to get it to scan at a store. Too bad cuz the idea is great. And STOP trying to use my gps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just installed it and it keeps forcing to close when I try to open it.. Useless.. (galaxy s)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok.
reviews.comment: Great concept, many places will not be able to scan phone screen. Considering size, needs to move to SD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing app! Very useful and holds all my cards. Works Great on my captivate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs backup feature!
reviews.comment: Decent App, but every time a new version came out I had to reenter all my cards.  Creator claimed a backup function was in the works.  That was over 2 years ago.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finally I can clean out the plastic clutter in my wallet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why does it need gps? Why does it say \"iphone application\" on splash screen?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great concept, crappy implementation. Why does this need 25mb of my memory and not let you move it to the Senior card? Not ready for prime time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love it it works for me all the time
reviews.author: tasha Herbert

reviews.comment: Needs a lot of work still. Force closes upon opening. Uninstalled HTC Hero
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: iphone
reviews.comment: splash screen says \"iphone\", that says it all.
reviews.author: Benoit Jadinon

reviews.title: Prefer to add cards via barcode
reviews.comment: Used to use Barcode Bank app, but, when I switched phones, I thought I would try this app.  After downloading and opening, it asked me if I wanted to add cards.  Didn\'t see an option to scan in my cards like Barcode Bank.  I do not want to manually enter all 24 cards numbers...going back to Barcode Bank App.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User
